docblock.description: User as file handle by streamWrapper implementation.
docblock.long-description: This class is responsible mainly for managing the pointer position during reading and writing.

docblock.description: Writes data to file. Will return the number of bytes written. Will advance pointer by number of bytes written.
Will read and return $bytes bytes from file. Will advance pointer by $bytes bytes.
Moves pointer to the end of file (for append modes).
Tells whether pointer is at the end of file.

docblock.description: Returns size as the number of child elements.
Returns child Node existing at path.

docblock.description: Class to hold the filesystem structure as object representation. It also provides access and factory methods for file system management.
docblock.long-description: An instance of Container is registered as a default stream options when FileSystem class is instantiated - it is later used by streamWrapper implementation to interact with underlying object representation.

docblock.description: Class constructor. Sets factory and root object on init.
Returns filesystem Node|Directory|File|Root at given path.

docblock.description: Abstract class to represent filesystem Node.

docblock.long-description: This will apply the DIR/FILE type mask for use by stat to distinguish between file and directory.

docblock.description: Stream wrapper class. This is the class that PHP uses as the stream operations handler.
Returns default expectation for stat() function.
Returns path stripped of url scheme (http://, ftp://, test:// etc.)
Returns Container object fished form default_context_options by scheme.
Returns stat data for file inclusion. Currently disabled.
Reads and returns $bytes amount of bytes from stream.
Checks whether pointer has reached EOF.
Called in response to mkdir to create directory.
Called in response to chown/chgrp/touch/chmod etc.

docblock.description: Main 'access' class to vfs implementation. It will register new stream wrapper on instantiation.
docblock.long-description: This class provides methods to get access to Container as well as file URI helper.

docblock.description: Class constructor. Will register both, the stream default options and wrapper handler.
docblock.long-description: Note: Each FileSystem instance will create NEW stream wrapper/scheme.

docblock.description: Registers Container object as default context option for scheme associated with FileSystem instance.
There is no known (to me) way to remove default context options as of yet.
Remoces wrapper registered for scheme associated with FileSystem instance.
Returns absolute path to full URI path (with scheme)
